attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to change the rate of the crowdsale

attributes.documentation:
@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase

_getTokenAmount

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.
@return Whether crowdsale period has elapsed
attributes.name: hasClosed

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to withdraw unsold tokens
attributes.name: withdrawTokens
